segments.text: This kitchen disaster has me feeling disgusted by the carelessness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding the counter and floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, unaware, with her wet foot.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's fussing over that plate like it's the only thing that matters.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Meanwhile, the kids are raiding the cookie jar on a rickety stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's about to topple, hand full of cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl eggs him on, palm up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's gross how the water's ruining the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is pristine, mocking the indoor sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't stand watching this unfold without anyone stopping it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked nearby could crash if someone slips.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene reeks of neglect.
segments.speaker: PAR
